name: Wavebook (GranadaJam)
description:
In a desperate wave of loneliness, you sign up in a new social network to meet new friends, but... Will you remember all those faces?

Jam Site: GranadaJam - Global Game Jam 2017

Diversifiers: Spaced:Played using only the spacebar - no mouse, no other inputs.

Lost library card:All sound sources are recorded or synthesised during the jam.

FMODCredits:

Adrian Portillo
Alejandro Molina
Beatriz I. Bustamante
Elior Dumont
Jesús Rodriguez de Guzmán
Valerio Sevilla
